channel.description: CIS 527 Lab 5 - The Cloud Overview What is the cloud? Image Source: Randall Munroe (XKCD) Image Source: Wikipedia Amazon Founder Jeff Bezos with an 1890s electric generator from a Belgian beer brewery Image Source: Information Week Jeffrey Energy Center near Wamego, KS Image Source: Open Buildings Image Source: Nicholas Carr Cloud Computing Orignally "Time Sharing" in 1950s Network Diagrams used "Cloud" Symbol for Unknown Networks & Systems Business VPNs in 1990s Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) in 2006 Image Source: Wikipedia
